com.freshbourne.io
Interface PageManager<T>

All Known Subinterfaces:
BufferPoolManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferPoolManagerImpl, DataPageManager, InnerNodeManager, LeafPageManager
public interface PageManager<T>

Classes implementing this interface provide controlled access to pages. The pages are usually cached by the implementing class.

Method Summary
 T createPage()
          creates a new valid Page whith a valid id for which space has been reserved in the resource.
 T getPage(long id)
           
 void removePage(long id)
          removes the Page with the given id
